name: Shadowblade
description: Rakes who have mastered the manipulation of shadows and stealth, becoming one with the darkness to strike with lethal precision while maintaining a pragmatic approach to their profession.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers stealth abilities and precision strikes
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when in shadows or darkness
mechanics: Energy points are spent to perform special stealth maneuvers and precision attacks
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to stealth and attack speed
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations
Successful shadow manipulation or stealth kills restore a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Cunning
resource_systems.description: Mental acuity and tactical awareness that enhances deception and exploitation of weaknesses
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully using stealth or exploiting weaknesses
mechanics: Increases by 20 when successfully executing precision strikes from stealth
Increases by 25 when manipulating shadows to gain tactical advantages
Decreases by 20 when detected during stealth or when tactical plans fail
Decreases by 25 when forced into direct confrontation without preparation
Can be spent to enhance stealth abilities or execute precision strikes
Higher Cunning increases critical hit chance and shadow manipulation effectiveness

resource_systems.name: Infamy
resource_systems.description: Reputation and notoriety that can be leveraged for intimidation or respect
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully completing difficult contracts or operations
mechanics: Increases by 15 when completing challenging contracts with perfect execution
Increases by 10 when demonstrating exceptional skill to potential clients
Decreases by 15 when failing publicly or being captured
Decreases by 10 when reputation is questioned or undermined
Can be spent to intimidate targets or impress potential clients
Higher Infamy increases the effectiveness of intimidation and reputation-based negotiations

resource_systems.name: Shadow Essence
resource_systems.description: Mystical connection to shadows and darkness that enhances stealth abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when in darkness or manipulating shadows
mechanics: Increases by 15 when operating in complete darkness
Increases by 10 when successfully manipulating shadows for tactical advantage
Decreases by 15 when exposed to bright light for extended periods
Decreases by 10 when shadow abilities are countered or dispelled
Can be spent to enhance shadow manipulation or execute shadow-based attacks
At maximum Shadow Essence, gain the ability to temporarily become one with shadows

class_mechanics.name: Shadow Manipulation
class_mechanics.description: Ability to control and shape shadows for various effects
effects: Can shape and solidify shadows to create temporary tools or weapons
Able to darken areas to create advantageous conditions for stealth
Can create shadow duplicates that mimic basic movements
Presence naturally dims lights and enhances shadows in the vicinity
Can use shadows as sensory extensions to scout areas without exposure

class_mechanics.name: Void Step
class_mechanics.description: Ability to step through shadows to move quickly or escape danger
effects: Can teleport short distances between shadows or dark areas
Able to partially phase into the shadow realm to avoid attacks
Can move at enhanced speed when traveling through shadows
Presence leaves minimal traces when moving through shadows
Can temporarily hide within shadows, becoming nearly undetectable

class_mechanics.name: Perfect Assassination
class_mechanics.description: Mastery of precision strikes and lethal techniques
effects: Significantly increased critical hit chance and damage from stealth
Can identify and target vital points with unerring accuracy
Able to execute kills silently and without leaving evidence
Presence is difficult to detect even by those actively searching
Can analyze targets to determine the most efficient elimination method

class_mechanics.name: Professional Pragmatism
class_mechanics.description: Practical approach to contracts and operations without moral constraints
effects: Can objectively assess contracts and situations without emotional bias
Able to maintain focus and efficiency regardless of mission parameters
Can adapt plans quickly when circumstances change
Presence conveys professional detachment that intimidates targets
Can establish and maintain a reputation for reliability and discretion

signature_abilities.name: Shadow Meld
signature_abilities.description: Become one with the shadows, gaining extraordinary stealth and combat abilities
mechanics: For 5 minutes, transform into a semi-corporeal shadow form
Gain near-perfect invisibility in any area not in direct bright light
Movement speed increased by 50% and can pass through narrow openings
Attacks deal additional shadow damage and have 100% critical chance from stealth
Immune to most physical traps and can briefly phase through thin barriers
Costs 100 Energy, 50 Cunning, and 75 Shadow Essence

signature_abilities.name: Shadow Network
signature_abilities.description: Create a network of connected shadows for unprecedented mobility and awareness
mechanics: For 10 minutes, mark up to 5 shadows within line of sight
Can instantly teleport between marked shadows at will
Gain sensory awareness of the area surrounding each marked shadow
Can launch attacks from any marked shadow as if you were physically present
Perfect for surveillance, escape, or coordinated strikes from multiple angles
Costs 75 Energy, 30 Infamy, and 50 Shadow Essence

signature_abilities.name: Perfect Execution
signature_abilities.description: Enter a state of perfect focus and precision for unmatched assassination capability
mechanics: For 3 minutes, gain perfect awareness of all targets within 100 meters
Can identify vital points and weaknesses with 100% accuracy
Movement becomes perfectly silent and leaves no traces
Each successful assassination extends the duration by 30 seconds
Time appears to slow during critical moments, allowing for perfect precision
Costs 50 Energy, 100 Shadow Essence, and 25 Cunning

skill_trees.name: Path of Shadows
skill_trees.focus: Mastery of shadow manipulation and movement
key_abilities: Shadow Walk: Move through shadows at incredible speed
Umbral Weapons: Create weapons from solidified shadow that bypass normal defenses
Dark Sanctuary: Create a zone of absolute darkness that only you can see through

skill_trees.name: Path of the Assassin
key_abilities: Vital Strike: Target critical vulnerabilities for instant kills
Ghost Kill: Eliminate targets without leaving any evidence
Death Mark: Tag a target for enhanced tracking and guaranteed critical strikes

skill_trees.name: Path of the Professional
key_abilities: Contingency Plan: Prepare fallback strategies that activate automatically when needed
Perfect Timing: Identify and exploit optimal moments for action
Professional Reputation: Leverage your reputation for intimidation or negotiation advantages

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Shadow Operative skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Neutral alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Successfully manipulate shadows for tactical advantage
Execute a perfect assassination without being detected

effects: Dexterity increased by 5
Can temporarily transform into shadow form when striking from stealth
Kills performed with this weapon leave no physical evidence

legendary_items.name: Shadowveil Cloak
effects: Shadow Essence maximum increased by 50
Can create areas of darkness that only you can see through

effects: Can mark targets for perfect tracking across any distance
Marked targets cannot detect your presence until you strike

lore: Shadowblades represent the pinnacle of stealth and precision among Rakes, having developed an unprecedented connection to shadows and darkness that allows them to move unseen and strike with lethal efficiency. These master assassins have transcended ordinary stealth techniques to develop an almost supernatural relationship with shadows, using them not just as concealment but as weapons, tools, and means of transportation. The path to becoming a Shadowblade requires not only exceptional stealth and combat skills but also a pragmatic mindset and the discipline to maintain professional detachment regardless of the mission. Those who succeed find themselves capable of seemingly impossible feats of infiltration and assassination, moving through heavily guarded locations like ghosts and eliminating targets without leaving a trace. Shadowblades typically operate as independent contractors, offering their specialized services to clients who can afford their considerable fees. Many establish reputations for absolute reliability and discretion, becoming the go-to operatives for high-risk, high-reward contracts that require perfect execution. Some specialize in specific types of targets or operations, developing unique techniques that make them unparalleled in their niche. Their combination of shadow manipulation, mobility, and lethal precision makes them feared by even the most well-protected individuals, who know that conventional security measures offer little protection against an experienced Shadowblade. Though they possess tremendous power, Shadowblades approach their profession with pragmatic detachment, viewing their abilities as tools of their trade rather than means for personal vendettas or political agendas. This professional neutrality allows them to work for various clients across the moral spectrum, though individual Shadowblades may establish personal codes regarding what contracts they will accept.
